deal_id: Auckland to Fiji and return - NEW CRUISING FROM NZ
title: Auckland to Fiji and return - NEW CRUISING FROM NZ
inclusions_evidence: Inside Stateroom, twin share.; AUD$400* Onboard Spending Money per stateroom; Main meals onboard; Entertainment; Government & port taxes Gratuities are included in your cruise fare.; Domestic airfares & transfers, if requried, are additional.

hotel.name_or_hint: Inside stateroom on cruise ship (package component)

items.label: Main meals, entertainment, government & port taxes, gratuities (included)

other.notes: Cruise fare includes an inside stateroom (twin share), onboard spending credit per stateroom, main meals, entertainment, government & port taxes and gratuities. Domestic airfares & transfers are explicitly noted as additional.

reasoning: Cannot reliably source DIY component prices (flights, direct cruise fare or equivalent third-party cruise listing) from external sites given constraints, so DIY totals are null. The package explicitly excludes flights and includes an inside stateroom (twin share), AUD400 onboard credit per stateroom, meals, entertainment, taxes and gratuities. At 1239.0 per person for a 9-night cruise this appears strong value, hence an 8/10 rating, but a definitive savings calculation versus DIY cannot be produced here.
additional_notes: To confirm real savings, obtain direct cruise-line fares for an inside stateroom on the same sailing and current return airfares Auckland–Fiji for two; include any required transfers. The deal page should be used as primary source for negotiations/booking.
